Build, Ship, Run

Docker is an open platform for developers and sysadmins to build, ship and run distributed applications anywhere.

Get started with Docker

Get Started Learn More

Announcing Docker 1.6

Unified release across Docker Engine 1.6, Registry 2.0 and Orchestration Tools accelerate developer experience and enhance sysadmin management.

Learn More

What is Docker?

Docker is a platform of open source and commercial software tool.

Build

Docker makes setting up dev environments fast, easy.

More

Ship

Docker allows developers to easily package their apps.

More

Run

Docker helps teams release more software changes faster.

More

Build Apps Faster

Docker makes setting up dev environments fast, easy and eliminates any concerns of inconsistencies between environments so developers can focus on building the best software.
